sqlMap.insert: /* WhmReceivingItemSQL > createReceivingItemCSQL */ INSERT INTO WHM_RCV_SHP_ITM ( FILE_NO, RGST_OFC_CD, CUST_ITM_ID, ITM_UT_CD, ITM_INR_QTY, ITM_CTN_QTY, ITM_EA_QTY, ITM_LOC_ID, ITM_DESC, ITM_PO_NO, ITM_LEN, ITM_WDT, ITM_HGT, ITM_DIM_WGT, ITM_ACT_WGT, ITM_VOL, ITM_DIM_WGT_LBS, ITM_ACT_WGT_LBS, ITM_VOL_CFT, ITM_BGN_BAL_QTY, ITM_ENDG_BAL_QTY, CRE_DT, CRE_USR_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USR_ID ) VALUES ( #file_no#, #rgst_ofc_cd#, #cust_itm_id#, #itm_ut_cd#, #itm_inr_qty#, #itm_ctn_qty#, #itm_ea_qty#, #itm_loc_id_CRUD#, #itm_desc#, #itm_po_no#, #itm_len#, #itm_wdt#, #itm_hgt#, #itm_dim_wgt#, #itm_act_wgt#, #itm_vol#, #itm_dim_wgt_lbs#, #itm_act_wgt_lbs#, #itm_vol_cft#, #itm_bgn_bal_qty#, #itm_endg_bal_qty#, GETDATE(), #cre_usr_id#, GETDATE(), #upd_usr_id# )
sqlMap.update: /* WhmReceivingSQL > saveReceivingUSQL */ UPDATE WHM_RCV_SHP SET WH_CD =#wh_cd#, RGST_OFC_CD =#rgst_ofc_cd#, CUST_CD =#cust_cd#, SPLR_RCVR_CD =#splr_rcvr_cd#, TRKR_CD =#trkr_cd#, CUST_REF_NO =#cust_ref_no#, INTER_RMK =#inter_rmk#, XTER_RMK =#xter_rmk#, RCV_SHP_FLG =#rcv_shp_flg#, OPR_CD =#opr_cd#, ESTM_RCV_DT =#estm_rcv_dt#, RCV_SHP_DT = #rcv_shp_dt#, PLT_NO =#plt_no#, CNTR_NO =#cntr_no#, MST_BL_NO =#mst_bl_no#, HUS_BL_NO =#hus_bl_no#, CUST_OFC_CD = #cust_ofc_cd#, SPLR_RCVR_OFC_CD = #splr_rcvr_ofc_cd#, TRKR_OFC_CD = #trkr_ofc_cd#, OPR_OFC_CD = #opr_ofc_cd#, LEN_UT_CD = #len_ut_cd#, UPD_DT = GETDATE(), UPD_USR_ID =#upd_usr_id# WHERE FILE_NO = #file_no#

/** WhmReceivingSQL.xml > setNewRcvFileNoUSQL*/ UPDATE TB_OFC SET WH_RCV_SEQ_NO = (SELECT WH_RCV_SEQ_NO + 1 FROM TB_OFC WHERE OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd#) WHERE OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd# /** WhmReceivingSQL.xml > setMaxLocIdRSQL*/

/** WhmReceivingSQL.xml > setNewRcvFileNoUSQL*/ UPDATE TB_OFC SET WH_SHP_SEQ_NO = (SELECT WH_SHP_SEQ_NO + 1 FROM TB_OFC WHERE OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd#) WHERE OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd# /** WhmReceivingSQL.xml > setMaxLocIdRSQL*/

UPDATE WHM_RCV_SHP_ITM SET ITM_UT_CD =#itm_ut_cd#, ITM_INR_QTY =#itm_inr_qty#, ITM_CTN_QTY =#itm_ctn_qty#, ITM_EA_QTY =#itm_ea_qty#, ITM_LOC_ID =#itm_loc_id_CRUD#, ITM_DESC =#itm_desc#, ITM_PO_NO =#itm_po_no#, ITM_LEN =#itm_len#, ITM_WDT =#itm_wdt#, ITM_HGT =#itm_hgt#, ITM_DIM_WGT =#itm_dim_wgt#, ITM_ACT_WGT =#itm_act_wgt#, ITM_VOL =#itm_vol#, ITM_DIM_WGT_LBS =#itm_dim_wgt_lbs#, ITM_ACT_WGT_LBS =#itm_act_wgt_lbs#, ITM_VOL_CFT =#itm_vol_cft#, ITM_BGN_BAL_QTY =#itm_bgn_bal_qty#, ITM_ENDG_BAL_QTY =#itm_endg_bal_qty#, UPD_DT = GETDATE(), UPD_USR_ID =#upd_usr_id# WHERE FILE_NO = #file_no# AND RGST_OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd# AND CUST_ITM_ID = #cust_itm_id#
sqlMap.delete: /* WhmReceivingItemSQL > saveReceivingItemDSQL */ DELETE FROM WHM_RCV_SHP_ITM WHERE FILE_NO = #file_no# AND RGST_OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd#
/* WhmReceivingItemSQL > deleteItemInventoryDSQL */ DELETE WHM_ITM_INVT WHERE LOC_ID = #loc_id# AND CUST_ITM_ID = #cust_itm_id# AND ITM_UT_CD = #itm_ut_cd# AND CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no#
/* WhmReceivingItemSQL > saveReceivingItem2DSQL */ DELETE FROM WHM_RCV_SHP_ITM WHERE FILE_NO = #file_no# AND RGST_OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd#
/* WhmReceivingItemSQL > saveReceivingListDSQL */ DELETE FROM WHM_RCV_SHP WHERE FILE_NO = #file_no# AND RGST_OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd# AND RCV_SHP_TP_CD = #rcv_shp_tp_cd#
sqlMap.select:
/* WhmReceivingSQL > searchReceivingItemRSQL */ SELECT IT.CUST_ITM_ID, ITM.ITEM_NM AS ITM_NM, IT.ITM_UT_CD, ISNULL(IT.ITM_INR_QTY, 0) ITM_INR_QTY, ISNULL(IT.ITM_CTN_QTY, 0) ITM_CTN_QTY, ISNULL(IT.ITM_EA_QTY, 0) ITM_EA_QTY, IT.ITM_LOC_ID, IT.ITM_DESC, IT.ITM_PO_NO, ISNULL(IT.ITM_LEN, 0) ITM_LEN, ISNULL(IT.ITM_WDT, 0) ITM_WDT, ISNULL(IT.ITM_HGT, 0) ITM_HGT, ISNULL(IT.ITM_DIM_WGT, 0) ITM_DIM_WGT, ISNULL(IT.ITM_ACT_WGT, 0) ITM_ACT_WGT, ISNULL(IT.ITM_VOL, 0) ITM_VOL, ISNULL(IT.ITM_DIM_WGT_LBS, 0) ITM_DIM_WGT_LBS, ISNULL(IT.ITM_ACT_WGT_LBS, 0) ITM_ACT_WGT_LBS, ISNULL(IT.ITM_VOL_CFT, 0) ITM_VOL_CFT, ISNULL(IT.ITM_BGN_BAL_QTY, 0) ITM_BGN_BAL_QTY, ISNULL(IT.ITM_ENDG_BAL_QTY, 0) ITM_ENDG_BAL_QTY,
ITM.ITEM_SYS_NO
FROM WHM_RCV_SHP_ITM IT, TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM ITM WHERE 1 =1
AND ITM.ITEM_CD = IT.CUST_ITM_ID AND IT.FILE_NO = #file_no# AND IT.RGST_OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd# AND ITM.CTRT_NO = (SELECT RS.CTRT_NO FROM WHM_WH WH, WHM_RCV_SHP RS WHERE 1 =1 AND WH.WH_CD = RS.WH_CD
AND RS.FILE_NO = #file_no# AND RS.RGST_OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd# AND RS.RCV_SHP_TP_CD = #rcv_shp_tp_cd#)

/* WhmReceivingSQL.xml > selectReceivingList */ SELECT DISTINCT WRS.WH_CD, (SELECT WH_NM FROM WHM_WH WH WHERE WH.WH_CD = WRS.WH_CD) WH_NM, WRS.FILE_NO, WRS.CUST_CD, (SELECT TOP 1 trbp.LOCL_NM FROM TB_TRDP trbp WHERE trbp.TRDP_CD = WRS.CUST_CD) CUST_NM, WRS.ESTM_RCV_DT AS BKG_DT, WRS.ESTM_RCV_DT, WRS.RCV_SHP_DT, WRS.CUST_REF_NO, (SELECT trbp.LOCL_NM FROM TB_TRDP trbp WHERE trbp.TRDP_CD = WRS.SPLR_RCVR_CD ) SPLR_NM, (SELECT trbp.LOCL_NM FROM TB_TRDP trbp WHERE trbp.TRDP_CD = WRS.TRKR_CD) TRKR_NM, STUFF(( SELECT ', ' + ITM1.ITM_PO_NO FROM WHM_RCV_SHP_ITM ITM1 WHERE 1=1 AND ITM1.FILE_NO = ITM2.FILE_NO AND ITM1.RGST_OFC_CD = ITM2.RGST_OFC_CD AND ITM1.ITM_PO_NO is not null AND ITM1.ITM_PO_NO <> ''
AND ITM1.CUST_ITM_ID = #itm_cd#
AND ITM1.ITM_PO_NO = #itm_po_no#
FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') [ITM_PO_NO], WRS.PLT_NO, WRS.CNTR_NO, WRS.MST_BL_NO, WRS.HUS_BL_NO, (SELECT LOCL_USR_NM from TB_USR WHERE USRID = WRS.OPR_CD
) RCV_BY, WRS.RGST_OFC_CD, WRS.SPLR_RCVR_CD, WRS.TRKR_CD, WRS.LEN_UT_CD, WRS.RCV_SHP_FLG FROM WHM_RCV_SHP WRS LEFT OUTER JOIN WHM_RCV_SHP_ITM ITM2 ON WRS.FILE_NO = ITM2.FILE_NO AND WRS.RGST_OFC_CD = ITM2.RGST_OFC_CD WHERE 1 = 1
AND WRS.WH_CD = #wh_cd#
AND WRS.RCV_SHP_TP_CD = #rcv_shp_tp_cd#
AND WRS.ESTM_RCV_DT between #etd_strdt# and #etd_enddt#
AND WRS.RCV_SHP_DT between #etd_strdt# and #etd_enddt#
AND WRS.RCV_SHP_DTY between #etd_strdt# and #etd_enddt#
AND WRS.FILE_NO = #file_no#
AND WRS.CUST_REF_NO = #cust_ref_no#
AND WRS.PLT_NO = #plt_no#
AND WRS.CNTR_NO = #cntr_no#
AND WRS.MST_BL_NO = #mst_bl_no#
AND WRS.HUS_BL_NO = #hus_bl_no#
AND WRS.CUST_CD = #cust_cd#
AND WRS.SPLR_RCVR_CD = #splr_rcvr_cd#
AND WRS.TRKR_CD = #trkr_cd#
AND WRS.RCV_SHP_FLG = #rcv_shp_flg#
AND WRS.RGST_OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd#
AND ITM2.CUST_ITM_ID = #itm_cd#
AND ITM2.ITM_PO_NO = #itm_po_no#
AND UPPER(WRS.CTRT_NO) = UPPER(#ctrt_no#)
SELECT CUST_ITM_ID, ITM_CD,ITM_NM FROM WHM_CUST_ITM WHERE 1=1 AND CUST_CD = #cust_cd#
SELECT ITM_CD, CUST_ITM_ID, ITM_NM, ITM_UT_CD, ITM_INR_QTY, ITM_WGT, ITM_WGT_LBS, ITM_VOL, ITM_VOL_CFT, ITM_LEN, ITM_WDT, ITM_HGT FROM WHM_CUST_ITM WHERE CUST_ITM_ID = #cust_itm_id#
SELECT FILE_NO FROM WHM_RCV_SHP WHERE 1 = 1 AND FILE_NO = #file_no# AND RCV_SHP_TP_CD = #rcv_shp_tp_cd#

/* searchItemInOutListByDateRSQL.Query */ SELECT RS.FILE_NO, RS.RGST_OFC_CD, RS.RCV_SHP_FLG, RS.RCV_SHP_DT, RS.RCV_SHP_TP_CD, RSI.ITM_LOC_ID, RSI.ITM_UT_CD, ISNULL(RSI.ITM_INR_QTY, 0) * ISNULL(RSI.ITM_CTN_QTY, 0) + ISNULL(RSI.ITM_EA_QTY, 0) ITM_TTL_QTY, ISNULL(RSI.ITM_BGN_BAL_QTY, 0) ITM_BGN_BAL_QTY, ISNULL(RSI.ITM_ENDG_BAL_QTY, 0) ITM_ENDG_BAL_QTY FROM WHM_RCV_SHP RS, WHM_RCV_SHP_ITM RSI WHERE 1 =1 AND RS.FILE_NO = RSI.FILE_NO AND RS.RGST_OFC_CD = RSI.RGST_OFC_CD AND RSI.CUST_ITM_ID = #cust_itm_id# AND RS.WH_CD = #wh_cd# AND ISNULL(RS.RCV_SHP_FLG, 'N') = 'Y' AND RS.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# AND RS.RCV_SHP_DT >= #rcv_shp_dt# ORDER BY RS.RCV_SHP_DT ASC,RS.RCV_SHP_TP_CD,RS.CRE_DT ASC

/* searchItemInventoryRSQL.Query */ SELECT INVT.CUST_ITM_ID, INVT.LOC_ID, ISNULL(INVT.ITM_TTL_CTN_QTY, 0) TTL_CTN_QTY, ISNULL(INVT.ITM_TTL_EA_QTY, 0) TTL_EA_QTY, ISNULL(INVT.ITM_TTL_QTY, 0) TTL_QTY, ISNULL(INVT.ITM_TTL_WGT, 0) TTL_WGT_KGS, ISNULL(INVT.ITM_TTL_WGT_LBS, 0) TTL_WGT_LBS, ISNULL(INVT.ITM_TTL_VOL, 0) TTL_VOL_CBM, ISNULL(INVT.ITM_TTL_VOL_CFT, 0) TTL_VOL_CFT FROM WHM_ITM_INVT INVT WHERE 1 = 1 AND INVT.CUST_ITM_ID = #cust_itm_id# AND INVT.LOC_ID = #loc_id# AND INVT.ITM_UT_CD = #itm_ut_cd# AND INVT.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# ORDER BY INVT.CUST_ITM_ID
sqlMap.update: /* updateItemInventoryUSQL.Query */ UPDATE WHM_ITM_INVT SET ITM_TTL_CTN_QTY = #ttl_ctn_qty#, ITM_TTL_EA_QTY = #ttl_ea_qty#, ITM_TTL_QTY = #ttl_qty#, ITM_TTL_WGT = #ttl_wgt_kgs#, ITM_TTL_VOL = #ttl_vol_cbm#, ITM_TTL_WGT_LBS = #ttl_wgt_lbs#, ITM_TTL_VOL_CFT = #ttl_vol_cft#, UPD_DT = GETDATE(), UPD_USR_ID = 'system' WHERE 1=1 AND LOC_ID = #loc_id# AND CUST_ITM_ID = #cust_itm_id# AND ITM_UT_CD = #itm_ut_cd# AND CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no#

UPDATE WHM_RCV_SHP_ITM SET ITM_BGN_BAL_QTY =#itm_bgn_bal_qty#, ITM_ENDG_BAL_QTY =#itm_endg_bal_qty#, UPD_DT = GETDATE(), UPD_USR_ID =#upd_usr_id# WHERE FILE_NO = #file_no# AND RGST_OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd# AND CUST_ITM_ID = #cust_itm_id# AND ITM_LOC_ID = #itm_loc_id# AND ITM_UT_CD = #itm_ut_cd#
sqlMap.insert:
/* WhmReceivingSQL > createItemInventoryCSQL */ INSERT INTO WHM_ITM_INVT ( LOC_ID, CUST_ITM_ID, ITM_TTL_CTN_QTY, ITM_TTL_EA_QTY, ITM_TTL_QTY, ITM_TTL_WGT, ITM_TTL_VOL, ITM_TTL_WGT_LBS, ITM_TTL_VOL_CFT, CRE_DT, CRE_USR_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USR_ID, ITM_UT_CD, CTRT_NO ) VALUES ( #loc_id#, #cust_itm_id#, #ttl_ctn_qty#, #ttl_ea_qty#, #ttl_qty#, #ttl_wgt_kgs#, #ttl_vol_cbm#, #ttl_wgt_lbs#, #ttl_vol_cft#, GETDATE(), #cre_usr_id#, GETDATE(), #upd_usr_id#, #itm_ut_cd#, #ctrt_no# )
/* WhmReceivingItemSQL > createReceivingItemCSQL */
sqlMap.select: SELECT ENG_USR_NM,OFC_CD FROM TB_USR WHERE 1 = 1 AND USRID = #cust_cd#
SELECT cd_nm,cd_val FROM TB_com_cd_dtl WHERE com_cd = 'C084' AND delt_flg = 'N'
SELECT ISNULL(MAX(RCV_SHP_FLG),'N') AS RCV_SHP_FLG FROM WHM_RCV_SHP WHERE FILE_NO = #file_no# AND RGST_OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd# AND RCV_SHP_TP_CD = #rcv_shp_tp_cd#
SELECT WH_CD, CUST_CD, MAX(DATE) AS DATE_CLS FROM WHM_HST WHERE 1=1 AND WH_CD = #wh_cd# AND CUST_CD = #cust_cd# AND DELT_FLG = 'N' GROUP BY WH_CD, CUST_CD
